alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:04PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Bay, east central Walton and central Washington Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 104 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles west of Vernon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bonifay, Live Oak, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Brock Crossroad, Red Bay, Whitehead Crossroads, Greenhead, Bruce, Red Head, Eucheeanna, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Five Points, Knox Hill, Smyrna, Spring Hollow, Poplar Head and Sylvania. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
